titleStmt.title: The hogge hath lost his pearle A comedy. Diuers times publikely acted, by certaine London prentices. By Robert Tailor.
titleStmt.author: Tailor, Robert, fl. 1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Richard Redmer, and are to be solde at the west-dore of Paules at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the west-dore of Paules at the signe of the Starre
